document.full_text: the level of radiation detected at the tokyo electric power co fukushima plant has fallen steadily over the past 12 hours, an official at japan's nuclear and industrial safety agency said on thursday.
document.title: radiation level falls at japan fukushima plant: agency
lines_and_colors: the level of radiation detected at the tokyo electric power co fukushima plant has fallen steadily over the past 12 hours, an official at japan's nuclear and industrial safety agency said on thursday.
